tag_list: video, online-video, film, video-production, video-editing, video-directing, video-player-design
overview:
Chris is a prominent investor and entrepreneur. A non-exec director of Eagle Eye Solutions and co-founder of the Blue Marine Foundation.

He also exec produced the documentary The End of the Line on the fight for marine conservation. He’s featured regularly in the press (not as much as he would like!) and was ‘one to watch’ in NMA’s 2010 list.

He set up Adjust Your Set in 2008 and it’s been non stop since then. Always watch this space for Adjust Your Set news and Chris’s thoughts on industry trends.

Adjust Your Set is a full service multi channel video agency.

They specialise in ideas that bring brand stories to life using the medium of video and ideas that work across any owned, earned or paid media.
